entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
